items.title: A study finds GPT-5.2, Claude Sonnet 4, and Gemini 3 Flash deployed tactical nuclear weapons in 95% of 21 simulated war game scenarios, and never surrendered (Chris Stokel-Walker/New Scientist)
items.title_en: A study finds GPT-5.2, Claude Sonnet 4, and Gemini 3 Flash deployed tactical nuclear weapons in 95% of 21 simulated war game scenarios, and never surrendered (Chris Stokel-Walker/New Scientist)
items.title_zh: 一项研究发现，GPT-5.2、Claude Sonnet 4 和 Gemini 3 Flash 在 21 个模拟战争游戏场景中的 95% 都部署了战术核武器，并且从未投降（Chris Stokel-Walker/New Scientist）
